title: Certification CRUD Controller
description:
Implement Physician Certification Management Controller with Face-to-Face Requirement Validation

Build a comprehensive controller to manage physician certifications, including validation of face-to-face encounter requirements for home health and hospice services.

Requirements:
- Create controller endpoints for CRUD operations on physician certifications
- Implement face-to-face encounter validation logic according to CMS requirements
- Validate certification dates and ensure they fall within acceptable timeframes
- Check physician credentials and authorization levels
- Enforce business rules for certification types (initial, recertification, etc.)
- Handle different certification requirements for home health vs hospice services
- Store certification metadata including physician information, encounter dates, and certification periods
- Implement proper error handling with specific validation failure messages
- Add audit logging for all certification actions
- Include date range validation to ensure face-to-face encounters occur within required windows (typically 90 days before or 30 days after start of care)

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Expired or soon-to-expire certifications
- Missing or incomplete physician information
- Face-to-face encounters occurring outside acceptable date ranges
- Retroactive certification attempts
- Duplicate certification submissions
- Certifications without proper physician signatures or documentation

Dependencies:
- Physician database/registry integration
- Patient eligibility verification system
- Document storage for certification records
- Notification system for expiring certifications
